text:
Editor's Note: Voting and Reranking have been closed.

Topping the Billboard charts and holding the top ranks on iTunes and Spotify, the music nominees for the 2018 People's Choice Awards cover some heavy-hitting artists. In comparison to so many awards ceremonies, however, there's not much like the People's Choice Awards voting where you, the general public, get the power to select the winners each year. While this can always be exciting for fans of today's biggest music sensations, it can also be a lot to consider. That being said, it has to be done.

From the top songs and albums of the year to the best male and female artists, each music category for the People's Choice Awards include a range of top stars. We're talking the ultimate hit-song generator Drake, female rap powerhouse Cardi B, Mr. Nice Guy Ed Sheeran, and the sweet Taylor Swift, among so many other great artists. Of all the People's Choice Awards 2018 nominees for music, though, who do you think will get the most votes? Could Bruno Mars take the Male Artist of 2018? Will BTS take the Group of 2018 award? That'll be up to you fans to decide.

If you can't get enough of voting, go ahead and check out the 44th People's Choice Awards nominations below and vote up the musicians you think have the best chance of topping their category.
title: 2018 People's Choice Awards: All Music Nominations
